result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.html: Cad fútsaWhat about yourself?
result.ponchtml: Cad fútsaWhat about yourself?

result.html: Céard fútsa a LiamWhat about you, Liam?
result.ponchtml: Céard fútsa a LiamWhat about you, Liam?

result.eng: I am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ga: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.orig: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.html: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeaċt a Ṗáidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
